messages.subject: Wheel of Dreaded Consequences
messages.msgSnippet: Yikes!!!! Jinger, I went and looked at that site and was horrified to discover it comes from our city!! Then I remembered a few years a go my psycho
messages.messageBody:
Yikes!!!! Jinger, I went and looked at that site and was horrified to
discover it comes from our city!! Then I remembered a few years a go my psycho
sister-in-law was up with my brother, and went to visit her friend here in town. She
brought home with her a prototype of this monstrosity you discovered!!! She
showed it to me and I managed to avoid discussing it, I found it horrid to say
the least.
I am so embarrassed for our fair city to be the source of this, and this
woman who does it is some sort of school counsellor or something I think.
EEEEWWWWWW!!!!!!!!!!
Nancy, cringing in BC


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
